# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
- Burner mining drill is currently out of fuel
- Stone furnace is currently out of fuel

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)
- Stone furnace is currently out of ingredients

### Inserter system at position (39.5, -79.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter is currently waiting for source items

### Inserter system at position (41.5, -78.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)
- Burner inserter is currently out of fuel

### Offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5)

- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Offshore pump is currently working

### Boiler system at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of following entities
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Boiler is currently out of fuel

### Steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5)

- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Steam engine is currently not connected

- Pipe group is currently empty

### Pipe system at position (105.5, -32.5)

- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Pipe group is currently full output

### Electricity system at position (114.5, -28.666666666666668)

- Electricity group is currently not plugged into electric network

### Belt system at position (40.5, -83.5)

- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Belt group is currently empty

### Transport belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is currently working

### Transport belt system at position (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is currently working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel

### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items to operate
- Check the status of inserter entities to ensure they are not waiting for source items

### Errors when using offshore pump entities
- Ensure that offshore pump entities are properly placed and configured
- Check the status of offshore pump entities to ensure they are working correctly

### Errors when using boiler entities
- Ensure that boiler entities have sufficient fuel to operate
- Check the status of boiler entities to ensure they are not out of fuel

### Errors when using steam engine entities
- Ensure that steam engine entities are properly connected
- Check the status of steam engine entities to ensure they are not disconnected

### Errors when using pipe entities
- Ensure that pipe entities are properly configured and connected
- Check the status of pipe entities to ensure they are not empty or full output

### Errors when using electricity entities
- Ensure that electricity entities are properly plugged into the electric network
- Check the status of electricity entities to ensure they are not unplugged

### Errors when using belt entities
- Ensure that belt entities are properly configured and connected
- Check the status of belt entities to ensure they are not empty

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
